message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth more than that to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $10,500?

Bob, I appreciate your offer. While I'm open to negotiation, $10,500 is a little too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,500.  This is still a great deal for you, and it gives us both something to work with. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit too far away from $11,500. I'd like to propose a price of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's the most I can go

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but $9,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway on your previous offer and propose $10,250. This is a fair price that allows us both to get a good deal. Let's close this deal!
